oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Photograph postcard of James Johnston in front of squad tent
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: This photograph postcard shows four World War I soldiers in uniform in front of a squad tent set on a wooden floored platform. Inside the tent, the cots are visible. This photograph was taken at Camp Sevier. On the reverse Johnston is identified as the soldier second from the left. Johnston served in the Ord. Corps and was attached to the 114th MG Battn., 30th Div.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Johnston, James McFerren
